Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! Long time reader, first time poster.

I'm having an issue with one of my crafts in Stock Career mode. Somehow The rover I made and put inside the 2.5 storage bay is moving around inside and causes the game crashes. The odd thing is, it is perfectly fine when I open the doors of the storage container. The issue is enlarged when I put an Air-stream shell over it I cant access it to settle down the movement mid flight so It always crashes. I'm using the mini separator to attach the rover to the top inside of the container. Below is the error log. No issues with any other craft at all. Just that small inner portion of the rocket. Any solutions would be greatly appreciated!!!! My build is very similar to Scott Manley's Career mode Part 22 Rover storage configuration.

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.6.4f1_99f88340878d]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module KSP.exe at 0023:01625510.

Error occurred at 2015-10-07_221214.

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Ryan.

36% memory in use.

0 MB physical memory [0 MB free].

0 MB paging file [0 MB free].

0 MB user address space [1458 MB free].

Read from location 00000138 caused an access violation.

Context:

EDI: 0x98585a34 ESI: 0x98585830 EAX: 0x00000206

EBX: 0x00000000 ECX: 0x00000000 EDX: 0x00000168

EIP: 0x01625510 EBP: 0x0035f464 SegCs: 0x00000023

EFlags: 0x00010203 ESP: 0x0035f314 SegSs: 0x0000002b

Bytes at CS:EIP:

8b 81 38 01 00 00 c3 cc cc cc cc cc cc cc cc cc

Hi Rrday-4, can you secure the rover with struts?

Also please put the craft file online somewhere and post the link here, dropbox is good for this.
